original_title: ドSな新卒女子がモラハラ上司へ危険な残業騎乗位調教 戸田真琴
overview: The boss of Makoto Toda, a new graduate girl, was a super high-pressure and worst man. Taking advantage of his position as the president's nephew, he experiences power harassment, moral harassment, and sexual harassment every day... However, when Toda yells at the limit of his patience, he sees his boss's hidden M nature... "Did you bully me on purpose? "Training Starts After Seeing Masochistic Sex! Contrary to the position in the company during the day, training overtime is dangerous at night!
title: Dangerous overtime riding position training for new graduates from boss Makoto Toda
